name: docx-viewer-wopi
description: A web application that opens DOCX files using WOPI and Microsoft Office Online

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && npm start" "cd frontend && npm run preview"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
